Class Parallelogram.OffsetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.ShapeBuilder
      • shapes.ArbitrarySimplePolygon.RotationBuilder
        • shapes.OrientedPolygon.BaseBuilder

            • shapes.OrientedPolygon.OffsetBuilder
              • shapes.Parallelogram.OffsetBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    Parallelogram

    public static class Parallelogram.OffsetBuilder
extends OrientedPolygon.OffsetBuilder
    A builder class for a Parallelogram using an offset. No arguments are added.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class shapes.ShapeBuilder

        ShapeBuilder.Arg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OffsetBuilder()
      Creates a Parallelogram builder which uses the length of the base, height, and horizontal offset between top and bottom edges to construct a Parallelogram.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Creates a new instance of the target Shape using the arguments of this ShapeBuilder.
